comments.message: Here's a start~There are 2 basic videos in this article HCW dressing up/undressing :  http://www.nytimes.com/2014/10/17/world/africa/ebola-liberia-west-africa-epidemic.htmlCNN doctor shows (using chocolate on his gloves) where he touched his skin taking off his garmentshttp://edition.cnn.com/video/?/video/health/2014/10/14/sgmd-gupta-ebola-suit-demo.cnn&video;_referrer=http%3A%2F%2Ft.co%2FqSWEdFoQhR

description: Video library of existing field conditions.
summary: Provide video to this community of each specific challenge so that we can solve the existing problems.
title: We need a video library of existing field conditions challenges.
